snippet: Peter Gelb, the Met Opera’s general manager, discusses his $16 million “Ring” production, coming together in full cycles for the first time, and future projects.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini notes that Peter Gelb has been both praised and criticized for the daring artistic choices he has made as general manager of the Metropolitan Opera, including the elaborate mechanical set produced for Wagner's Ring Cycle.
lead_paragraph: Peter Gelb, the Met Opera’s general manager, discusses his $16 million “Ring” production, coming together in full cycles for the first time, and future projects.
